name: The Debate Game
description:
Game was developed during 2018 by a group of students at Högskolan I Skövde as part of an assignment. 

Uploading this for future reference. 

Developers: Anton P, Wilmer N, Linus G, Joel H, Danica Vl, Kristin W, Johan B, Fredrik J, Märta P, Sebastian E, Sebastian K
